alert.note: Alert for Central Carbon County; North Snowy Range Foothills; Snowy Range; Upper North Platte River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 3:56PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Carbon County through 445 PM MDT... At 355 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sinclair, or near Rawlins, moving east at 40 mph. At 346 PM, Walcott Junction mesonet station recorded a wind gust of 61 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rawlins, Sinclair and Teton Reservoir. This includes Interstate 80 in Wyoming between mile markers 210 and 252. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Carbon County; North Snowy Range Foothills; Snowy Range; Upper North Platte River Basin
